# DLMtool

The Data-Limited Methods toolkit (DLMtool) is a collection of
data-limited management procedures that can be evaluated with management
strategy evaluation (MSE).

DLMtool is part of the `openMSE` collection of packages.

You can learn more about the `openMSE` packages at the [openMSE
documentation site](https://openMSE.com).

## Installation

You can install the released version of DLMtool from
[CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("DLMtool")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Blue-Matter/DLMtool")
```

# Package index

## Output Controls

Management Procedures that return a total allowable catch (TAC)

- [`AvC()`](AvC.md) : Average Catch
- [`BK()`](BK.md) [`BK_CC()`](BK.md) [`BK_ML()`](BK.md) : Beddington and
  Kirkwood life-history MP
- [`CC1()`](CC1.md) [`CC2()`](CC1.md) [`CC3()`](CC1.md)
  [`CC4()`](CC1.md) [`CC5()`](CC1.md) [`CurC()`](CC1.md) : Geromont and
  Butterworth (2015) Constant Catch
- [`CompSRA()`](CompSRA.md) [`CompSRA4010()`](CompSRA.md) :
  Age-Composition Stock-Reduction Analysis
- [`DCACs()`](DCAC.md) [`DCAC()`](DCAC.md) [`DCAC_40()`](DCAC.md)
  [`DCAC4010()`](DCAC.md) [`DCAC_ML()`](DCAC.md) [`DAAC()`](DCAC.md)
  [`HDAAC()`](DCAC.md) : Depletion Corrected Average Catch
- [`DBSRA()`](DBSRA.md) [`DBSRA_40()`](DBSRA.md)
  [`DBSRA4010()`](DBSRA.md) : Depletion-Based Stock Reduction Analysis
- [`DD()`](DD.md) [`DD4010()`](DD.md) : Delay - Difference Stock
  Assessment
- [`Fratio()`](Fratio.md) [`Fratio4010()`](Fratio.md)
  [`DepF()`](Fratio.md) [`Fratio_CC()`](Fratio.md)
  [`Fratio_ML()`](Fratio.md) : FMSY/M ratio methods
- [`DynF()`](DynF.md) : Dynamic Fratio MP
- [`Fadapt()`](Fadapt.md) : Adaptive Fratio
- [`Fdem()`](Fdem.md) [`Fdem_CC()`](Fdem.md) [`Fdem_ML()`](Fdem.md) :
  Demographic FMSY method
- [`GB_CC()`](GB_CC.md) : Geromont and Butterworth Constant Catch
  Harvest Control Rule
- [`GB_slope()`](GB_slope.md) : Geromont and Butterworth index slope
  Harvest Control Rule
- [`GB_target()`](GB_target.md) : Geromont and Butterworth target CPUE
  and catch MP
- [`Gcontrol()`](Gcontrol.md) : G-control MP
- [`ICI()`](ICI.md) [`ICI2()`](ICI.md) : Index Confidence Interval
- [`Iratio()`](Iratio.md) : Mean Index Ratio
- [`Islope1()`](Islope1.md) [`Islope2()`](Islope1.md)
  [`Islope3()`](Islope1.md) [`Islope4()`](Islope1.md) : Index Slope
  Tracking MP
- [`IT5()`](IT5.md) [`IT10()`](IT5.md) : Iterative Index Target MP
- [`Itarget1()`](Itarget1.md) [`Itarget2()`](Itarget1.md)
  [`Itarget3()`](Itarget1.md) [`Itarget4()`](Itarget1.md) : Incremental
  Index Target MP
- [`ITM()`](ITM.md) : Index Target based on natural mortality rate
- [`Ltarget1()`](Ltarget1.md) [`Ltarget2()`](Ltarget1.md)
  [`Ltarget3()`](Ltarget1.md) [`Ltarget4()`](Ltarget1.md)
  [`L95target()`](Ltarget1.md) : Length Target TAC MP
- [`Lratio_BHI()`](Lratio_BHI.md) [`Lratio_BHI2()`](Lratio_BHI.md)
  [`Lratio_BHI3()`](Lratio_BHI.md) : Mean length-based indicator MP of
  Jardim et al. 2015
- [`LstepCC1()`](LstepCC1.md) [`LstepCC2()`](LstepCC1.md)
  [`LstepCC3()`](LstepCC1.md) [`LstepCC4()`](LstepCC1.md) : Step-wise
  Constant Catch
- [`MCD()`](MCD.md) [`MCD4010()`](MCD.md) : Mean Catch Depletion
- [`Rcontrol()`](Rcontrol.md) [`Rcontrol2()`](Rcontrol.md) : Intrinsic
  rate of Increase MP
- [`SBT1()`](SBT1.md) [`SBT2()`](SBT1.md) : SBT simple MP
- [`SPmod()`](SPmod.md) : Surplus production based catch-limit modifier
- [`SPMSY()`](SPMSY.md) : Catch trend Surplus Production MSY MP
- [`SPslope()`](SPslope.md) : Slope in surplus production MP
- [`SPSRA()`](SPSRA.md) [`SPSRA_ML()`](SPSRA.md) : Surplus Production
  Stock Reduction Analysis
- [`YPR()`](YPR.md) [`YPR_CC()`](YPR.md) [`YPR_ML()`](YPR.md) : Yield
  Per Recruit analysis to get FMSY proxy F01

## Input Controls

Management Procedures that return a total allowable effort (TAE),
spatial closure, or size regulation

- [`curE()`](curE.md) [`curE75()`](curE.md) : Fishing at current effort
  levels
- [`DDe()`](DDe.md) [`DDes()`](DDe.md) [`DDe75()`](DDe.md) :
  Effort-based Delay - Difference Stock Assessment
- [`DTe40()`](DTe40.md) [`DTe50()`](DTe40.md) : Effort searching MP
  aiming for a fixed stock depletion
- [`EtargetLopt()`](EtargetLopt.md) : Effort Target Optimum Length
- [`ItargetE1()`](ItargetE1.md) [`ItargetE2()`](ItargetE1.md)
  [`ItargetE3()`](ItargetE1.md) [`ItargetE4()`](ItargetE1.md) :
  Incremental Index Target MP - Effort-Based
- [`ITe5()`](ITe5.md) [`ITe10()`](ITe5.md) : Index Target Effort-Based
- [`LstepCE1()`](LstepCE1.md) [`LstepCE2()`](LstepCE1.md) : Step-wise
  Constant Effort
- [`LtargetE1()`](LtargetE1.md) [`LtargetE4()`](LtargetE1.md) : Length
  Target TAE MP
- [`matlenlim()`](matlenlim.md) [`matlenlim2()`](matlenlim.md)
  [`minlenLopt1()`](matlenlim.md) [`slotlim()`](matlenlim.md) : Size
  limit management procedures
- [`MRreal()`](MRreal.md) [`MRnoreal()`](MRreal.md) : Spatial closure
  and allocation management procedures

## Mixed Controls

Management Procedures that return a combination of Output and Input
controls

- [`AvC_MLL()`](AvC_MLL.md) : Average Catch with a size limit
- [`Itarget1_MPA()`](Itarget1_MPA.md) : Itarget1 with an MPA
